cards.title: Sun City Resort
cards.description: Luxury resort complex with casinos, golf courses, water parks, and the Valley of Waves.

cards.title: Soweto
cards.description: Vibrant township rich in history and culture, home to the famous Vilakazi Street.

cards.title: Mandela House
cards.description: Former home of Nelson Mandela, now a museum showcasing his life and legacy.

cards.title: Gold Reef City
cards.description: Theme park and casino complex built on an old gold mine with thrilling rides.

cards.title: Cradle of Humankind
cards.description: UNESCO World Heritage Site with limestone caves containing hominid fossils.

cards.title: Constitution Hill
cards.description: Historical site housing the Constitutional Court and Old Fort prison complex.

cards.title: APARTHEID Museum
cards.address: Northern Parkway, Gold Reef City, Johannesburg
cards.description: Powerful museum chronicling South Africa's apartheid era and struggle for freedom.

cards.title: Chobe Park
cards.description: Beautiful urban park offering nature trails and wildlife viewing opportunities.
